module.name: whitepapers
module.description:
This is the whitepaper module. It allows you to upload a whitepaper and keep track of how many times it is downloaded.
It is also possible to choose the way to receive the file. The options are: - download: the user will enter some credentials and after validation he will be allowed to download the file. - send by email: the user will enter some credentials and after validation the file will be send to the specified email.
